papers.summary: Work with UT Austin on transfer learning between language representations
PhD work on the representational format of memories in short- and long-term memory
A large group effort paper describing neuroimaging analysis methods (e.g. inverted encoding model) with code examples demonstrating use of the open-source software library BrainIAK

conferences.summary: Lightning talks on (1) multi-timescale LSTM encoding models and (2) transfer learning between language representations
Organized workshop, ''How can findings about the brain improve AI systems?''

summary: Paper on representations in short-term and long-term memory accepted to Cerebral Cortex

conferences.summary: Lightning talks on (1) multi-timescale LSTM encoding models and (2) NLP and neural taskonomy
Organized workshop, ''How can findings about the brain improve AI systems?''
